Package GxStatusBar

The module contains a collection of classes to manipulate the grid's statusbar

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GxStatusBarComponentInterface
    An interface which defines a status bar component
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GxStatusBar
    GxStatusBar Gx status bar manager.
    GxStatusBarAggregationComponent
    A statusbar component which provides aggregations on the selected range.
    GxStatusBarComponent
    An Abstract implementation for GxStatusBarComponentInterface
    GxStatusBarFilteredRowCountComponent
    A statusbar component which provides the filtered row count.
    GxStatusBarSelectedRowCountComponent
    A statusbar component which provides the selected row count
    GxStatusBarTotalAndFilteredRowCountComponent
    A statusbar component which provides the total and filtered row count.
    GxStatusBarTotalRowCountComponent
    A statusbar component which provides the total row count.

Package GxStatusBar Description

The module contains a collection of classes to manipulate the grid's statusbar
